name: fresh-water
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.platinum: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
